duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide critical care and ICU services including bedside procedures and patient care.
Collaborate with fellow healthcare providers in the management of emergency and critical care cases.
Participate in on-call schedules and provide care during night shifts.
Ensure compliance with healthcare regulations and standards in the delivery of care.

education_certification.credential: Master's Degree in Advanced Practice Nursing or Physician Assistant Studies (APRN/PA-C certification required)
